Interface AlleleFeatureAdaptor

extends Adaptor

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(Location location)
                     throws AdaptorException
Return AlleleFeatures overlapping the location.

Parameters:
location - location filter.
Returns:
zero or more AlleleFeatures overlapping the location.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(Transcript transcript,
                            int flankSize)
                     throws AdaptorException
Return all the AlleleFeatures hitting the transcript and it's 5prime and 3prime flanking regions. We use the transcripts location as defined by the start of it's first exon to the end of it's last exon (including introns).

Parameters:
transcript - transcript of interest.
flankSize - flanking region size.
Returns:
zero or more AlleleFeatures hitting the transcript or it's flanking regions.
Throws:
AdaptorException
